common.studentFilterSubText: Select students whose performance you want to view.
common.assignmentNavigationRestricted: You don’t have access to this LCB because it is associated with another teacher/school.
common.restrictedAssignmentAvgInfo: Note: School/Class averages are based on where the test was taken.

wholeLearnerReport.assignTutoringDisabled: Your district/school doesn't have an active Pear Deck Tutor license. Upgrade now to assign expert tutors for targeted student support.
wholeLearnerReport.noCheckedStandardsMessage: Please choose a standard or domain to assign a tutor.
wholeLearnerReport.maxCheckedStandardsMessage: Please select max 3 standards for the tutor to focus on.
wholeLearnerReport.noTutoringSessions: Student hasn’t taken any session yet.
wholeLearnerReport.noPremiumAccess: You don’t have Edulastic reports access (Premium/Enterprise license).

responseFrequency.performanceColumnTooltip: Performance % is not available at part level as item level scoring is turned on.
responseFrequency.maxScoreColumnTooltip: Max Score is not available at part level as item level scoring is turned on.
responseFrequency.responsesColumnTooltip: Responses are available at part level only.
responseFrequency.skipColumnTooltip: Skip % is only available at part level.

subGroupReport.averageColumnTooltipText: Average Score is calculated without applying any filters, except for 'Test Type'. For instance, selecting a specific school as a filter won't affect this average; it includes all schools. However, the 'Filtered Average' column on the right will show the average for only the selected school.
subGroupReport.filteredAverageColumnTooltipText: Average Score is calculated considering all applied filters. For instance, selecting a specific school as a filter will show the average for only the selected school. However, the 'Average' column on the left will show the average for all schools.
